mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_menu (menu_id, menu_name, menu_path, menu_comment, is_delete, create_user, create_time, version) values (#{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{menuPath}, #{menuComment}, 0, #{createUser}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select a.menu_id menuId, a.menu_name menuName, version from t_sys_menu a where a.is_delete = 0 order by update_time desc
select menu_name menuName, menu_path menuPath, menu_comment menuComment, version from t_sys_menu where menu_id = #{menuId} and is_delete = 0
mapper.update: update t_sys_menu set menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_path = #{menuPath}, menu_comment = #{menuComment}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{updateUser}, version = version + 1 where menu_id = #{menuId} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select a.menu_id menuId, a.menu_name menuName from t_sys_menu a where a.is_delete = 0 order by update_time desc
select a.menu_id menuId, a.menu_name menuName, a.menu_path menuPath from t_sys_menu a where a.is_delete = 0 and menu_name in ('客户管理','订单管理','门店信息管理') order by update_time desc
